p: RT-qPCR was used to analyze the expression of BDNF, and this widely distributed brain neurotrophin was selected to being assayed because of its involvement in critical regulatory roles of signaling pathways, which are involved in cognitive function-determining processes, such as developmental processes, neuroprotection, and synaptic plasticity [ 87, 88] including short- and long-lasting synaptic interactions involved in the mechanism of memory and cognition.
